name: Watermelon Gun Shooter Fun 17
description:
Watermelon shooting is fun and engaging shooter game. Shoot out all watermelons in this interactive shooting game. Watermelon shooting is a challenging first person shooter game. Watermelon shooting game is suitable for children of all ages. Rotate your device in all directions to find and shoot all the watermelons. With colorful graphics and attractive game play.

Be a good shooter hit the right spot and don’t shoot the wrong target. You have limited bullets to shoot the watermelon. Practice your shot in your favorite shooting game of 2017. Just aim and shoot and there goes the watermelon bursting into pieces! Simple and exciting!
